Missing $scope object
error in component $controller 

Cannot export controller '{0}' as '{1}'! No $scope object provided via `locals`.

Description

This error occurs when $controller ***REMOVED*** is called in order to instantiate a new controller but no scope is provided via $scope property of the locals map.

Example of incorrect usage that leads to this error:

$controller(MyController);
//or
$controller(MyController, {scope: newScope});

To fix the example above please provide a scope to the $controller call:

$controller(MyController, {$scope, newScope});

Please consult the $controller ***REMOVED*** api docs to learn more.
